name: Endless Magic Beans
description:
NOTA: La tabla de clasificación no es visible en WEB pero sí en el ejecutable.

NOTE: The Leaderboard is not visible in WEB but in the executable it is.

Gameplay Instructions:

Esc = Continue / Pause
Hold down "A" = Left
Hold down "S" = Slow down
Hold down "D" = Right
Hold down "W " = Increase speed

Game created for:

Escuela de Juegos JAM #4 2020

With the Theme: "Rewards / Gifts"

I use the reward system that is used to motivate players, it is a classic point system.

----------------------------------------------------------------

Beans designed by JuanPa Draws

https://www.deviantart.com/juanpadraws
